articles.title: Maga criticises the first American pope as not 'America First' - BBC

articles.title: Trump's float of a tax hike for the wealthy quickly runs into GOP resistance - NBC News
articles.description: President Donald Trump’s last-minute push to raise taxes on the wealthiest Americans is running into a buzzsaw of opposition in the Republican Party.
articles.content:
President Donald Trumps last-minute push to raise taxes on the wealthiest Americans is running into a buzz saw of opposition in the Republican Party, where such proposals have long been anathema.

articles.title: Trump floats 100% tariff on Barbies while his UK trade ‘deal’ shields super-luxury cars like Rolls-Royce - CNN
articles.description: Even as President Donald Trump pushes a message of self-sacrifice when it comes to how many dolls American children should own, his administration’s first trade “deal” includes a carveout for cars – luxury ones.
